webscript.shortname: Add a signature for certification to a document
webscript.description:
Add a signature for certification to a document

Parameters:

  • page: the page-number on which the digital signature will be printed (Any strictly positive number)
  • position: the position as a "[posX];[posY]" string
  • size: the size as a "[width]x[height]" string
  • field-name: the signature-field to sign in (that should exist)
  • password: the password protecting the certificate (private-key)
  • reason: optionnaly, the reason of the signature
  • location: optionally, the location of the signature (the place)
  • alias: optionnally, the alias of the certificate (w.r.t. key-store)
  • nodeRef/nodeRefs
